attributes.action: Stop any toll charges added to Blackwall tunnel in East London
attributes.additional_details: This is not fair as this would mean the new silver town crossing due to open, blackwall tunnel and QE2 bridge crossing will all have tolls. Cost of living is already high and this is not right.
attributes.background: Sadiq Khan wants to introduce a toll on the blackwall tunnel. Every cross in central and west london is free. This Mayor wants to punish east london with a toll on the blackwall tunnel

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. It is the responsibility of the Mayor of London and the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here: https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
